name: Tanko Bushi Bon Odori Dance
description: Japanese Traditional Dance. Learn the basic movement of Tanko Bushi Bon Odori Dance.

reviews.comment: Absolutely loved learning this dance! The steps were broken down clearly.
Good tutorial, but I wish there were more slow-motion segments.

name: Bharatanatyam Basics
description: Classical Indian dance from Tamil Nadu. Learn basic postures, hand gestures (mudras), and footwork.

reviews.comment: Priya explains the mudras so beautifully. A must-have for beginners!

name: Buchaechum Korean Fan Dance
description: Learn the beautiful Buchaechum, a traditional Korean dance using peony-painted fans to create graceful shapes.

reviews.comment: The fan techniques are tricky but the instructor makes it easy to follow.

name: Flamenco Fundamentals
description: Master the passion of Flamenco. Covers rhythm (compás), footwork, and expressive arm movements.

name: Ukrainian Hopak Dance
description: An energetic Ukrainian folk dance. Learn the basic squats, kicks, and spirited jumps.

name: Irish Stepdance Beginner
description: Learn the traditional footwork and rhythm of Irish Stepdance, including the Reel and Jig steps.

name: Brazilian Samba
description: Experience the vibrant rhythm of Brazilian Samba. Learn the basic bounce, footwork, and styling.

name: Italian Tarantella
description: A fast-paced, cheerful Italian folk dance. Learn the characteristic light steps and tambourine rhythms.

name: Maori Haka Workshop
description: Learn the powerful movements and chants of the Haka, a traditional Māori ancestral war cry and challenge.

name: Tinikling Bamboo Dance
description: Master the Tinikling, the Philippine National Dance involving rhythmic stepping between bamboo poles.
